seoHome.title: Centralia Travel Agency | Discover the Silk Road & Central Asia Tours

seoAbout.title: About Us | Centralia Travel Agency ‚Äî Experts in Central Asia & Silk Road Tours
seoAbout.description: Learn about Centralia Travel Agency, a trusted tour operator offering premium travel experiences across Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan.
seoAbout.ogTitle: About Centralia Travel Agency | Your Central Asia Experts
seoAbout.ogDescription: Discover our mission, experience, and commitment to providing unforgettable journeys along the Silk Road and Central Asia.

seoBlogs.title: Central Asia Travel Blog ‚Äì Expert Guides, Tips & Destinations
seoBlogs.description: Explore Central Asia with expert travel guides, itineraries, tips and stories. Discover Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Turkmenistan.

footer.title: We design and operate authentic adventure travel experiences across Central Asia.

category.title: Marvels of Central Asia

popularDes.title: Most requested Adventure tours
popularDes.desc: From high mountains to remote deserts, these tours represent the best adventure experiences Central Asia has to offer.

plan.title: Personal itinerary
plan.description: Tell us where you want to go, how adventurous you are, and how much time you have. We‚Äôll design a personalized route across Central Asia, tailored to your interests, pace, and experience level.
plan.tripDesc: Every route is designed from scratch ‚Äî based on your preferences, season, and adventure level.
plan.guideDesc: Planned by professionals who know the mountains, deserts, and remote regions first-hand.
plan.item3Desc: Transport, permits, equipment, and support ‚Äî fully organized and reliable.

services.headDesc: The best travel solutions for your journey ‚Äî carefully designed, locally operated, and fully supported.
services.title: Trip Planning for the Best Travel Experience Possible
services.desc: Welcome to our travel agency, where we specialize in providing our clients with unforgettable travel experiences.Whether you're looking to relax on a tropical beach or embark on a cultural adventure, we can help you plan your dream vacation. From flights and accommodations to tours and activities, we'll handle all the details, so you can focus on making memories.

serviceItems.title: Perfect Vacation come True
serviceItems.desc: Let us help you plan your next adventure

items.title: Transportation
items.desc: Comfortable and reliable transportation across Central Asia ‚Äî airport transfers, intercity travel, and private vehicles with professional drivers.

items.title: Visa Support
items.desc: We assist you with visa guidance, invitation letters, and documentation to ensure a smooth and stress-free entry.

items.title: Tours
items.desc: Carefully curated group and private tours across Uzbekistan and Central Asia ‚Äî culture, nature, and authentic experiences.

items.title: Travel itineraries
items.desc: Our team of experts will take care of all the planning and logistics, providing you with a detailed itinerary.

items.title: Travel Insurance
items.desc: Travel insurance is an essential part of any trip, providing peace of mind and protection.

items.title: Corporate & B2B
items.desc: Tailored travel solutions for businesses, conferences, and group events with dedicated support.

helpService.title: Let us Help you Plan your Next Getaway Now
helpService.desc: Contact our agency and we will get you a quote in a very short time. Discover the world with us! Book your next unforgettable adventure today.

ourNumbers.title: Our Numbers in the World
ourNumbers.desc: Our team of experienced travel experts can provide you with personalized recommendations and advice to create a trip that suits your preferences and budget. Various destinations around the world. With our knowledge and expertise in the travel industry, we ensure that all aspects of your trip.

about.title: The perfect Vocation come true with our Travel Agency
about.shortDesc: Explore the world with us, one adventure at a time.
about.desc: We are a team of experienced travel experts who specialize in planning and organizing unforgettable travel experiences for our clients with a wide range of travel services, including flight bookings, hotel reservations and more.

tourDetails.incExcDesc: To help you plan your trip, we have put together a list of what's included and what's not included in your tour package. This will give you a clear understanding of what to expect and help you make any necessary arrangements before your journey begins.
tourDetails.mapDesc: This comprehensive map is designed to guide you through an exciting journey filled with remarkable destinations and captivating experiences.
tourDetails.iteneraryDesc: We have carefully planned out each day to give you the best possible experience. From exploring historic landmarks to tasting delicious local cuisine, each day is packed with adventure and excitement. Join us as we take you on a journey through some of the most fascinating destinations in the world.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro:
Centralia Travel Agency ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and submit information through our forms.

By using our website and submitting any form, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect personal information only when you voluntarily submit it through forms on our website.
informationWeCollect.listTitle: The types of information we may collect include:
items: Full name
Email address
Phone number
Tour details and travel preferences
Meeting point or pickup location information
Any additional information you choose to provide in form fields
informationWeCollect.note: üîí We do not require user registration and do not collect usernames, passwords, or account credentials.

howWeUseInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use your personal information solely for legitimate business purposes, including:
items: Responding to inquiries and booking requests
Contacting you regarding tours or travel details
Organizing tour logistics and customer support
Improving our services and communication
howWeUseInformation.note: We do not use your data for automated decision-making or marketing profiling.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on:
items: Your consent, provided when you submit a form
Legitimate interests, such as responding to travel requests and delivering our services
legalBasis.note: You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We respect your privacy and do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data.
dataSharing.subtitle: Your information may be shared only with:
items: Authorized staff members of Centralia Travel Agency
Trusted third-party service providers (such as email or CRM services) strictly for operational purposes
dataSharing.note: All parties are required to keep your data confidential and secure.

dataStorage.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from:
items: Unauthorized access
Loss or misuse
Alteration or disclosure
dataStorage.note: Your data is stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill its intended purpose or to comply with legal obligations.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Website Functionality
cookies.content: Our website may use basic cookies to ensure proper functionality and performance.
cookies.subtitle: We do not use cookies for:
items: Advertising or marketing tracking
Behavioral profiling
cookies.note: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Request access to your personal data
Request correction or deletion of your data
Withdraw your consent at any time
Ask how your personal data is being processed
yourRights.note: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 8. Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content:
Our website may contain links to third-party websites.
We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those external websites.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content:
Our services are not intended for children under the age of 16.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how your personal data is handled, please contact us:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the Centralia Travel Agency website. By accessing our website or submitting any form, you agree to these Terms.

scopeOfServices.title: 1. Scope of Services
items: Travel information
Tour inquiries and booking requests
Travel consultations and coordination

importantNotice.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice:
points: No payments are processed through this website.
The website is used only to submit inquiries and booking requests.
All payments, if applicable, are handled offline and separately, after direct communication with our staff.

noOnlinePayments.title: 2. No Online Payments
noOnlinePayments.content: The website does not support online payments
points: No credit card, debit card, or online payment data is collected
Submitting a form does not require any payment
Any payment arrangements are discussed and agreed upon outside the website.

noUserAccounts.title: 3. No User Accounts
points: All communication is initiated via submitted forms.

userResponsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: By using the website, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and truthful information
Submit inquiries for legitimate travel purposes only
Refrain from misuse, abuse, or fraudulent submissions
userResponsibilities.note: You are responsible for the accuracy of all information you provide.

bookingRequests.title: 5. Booking Requests
bookingRequests.content: Form submission does not guarantee availability or confirmation
points: A booking is confirmed only after direct approval by Centralia Travel Agency
We reserve the right to request additional information

pricesAvailability.title: 6. Prices & Availability
points: Prices shown (if any) are indicative only
Availability depends on partners and seasonal factors

changesCancellations.title: 7. Changes & Cancellations
points: Are provided on a case-by-case basis
May vary depending on the tour and third-party partners

intellectualProperty.title: 8. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All website content, including text, images, branding, and design, is the property of Centralia Travel Agency and may not be reused without permission.

thirdPartyServices.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content:
Some services may involve third-party providers.
Centralia Travel Agency is not liable for actions or failures of third parties beyond its control.

limitationOfLiability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
items: Delays, cancellations, or force majeure events
Personal injury, loss, or damage beyond our reasonable control
limitationOfLiability.note: Travel participation is at your own risk.

privacy.title: 11. Privacy
privacy.content: Personal data is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

changesToTerms.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content:
We may update these Terms at any time.
Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms, contact us:
